content:
[caption]

[setting] The setting is the interview room.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] The interviewer, a neutral figure, sits across from me.
[/setting]

[caption]

[setting] The question is posed.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] I respond, maintaining a consistent character throughout the interview.
[/setting]

[caption]

[setting] The interviewer's note pad records the answer.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] The interview proceeds with further inquiries.
[/setting]

[caption]

[setting] The interview concludes with a polite acknowledgment.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] I part with the interviewer, ready to move on to the next stage of the process.
[/setting]
name: Max Müller

content:
[caption]

[setting] The setting remains the same.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] The question is directed to the wrong participant.
[/setting]

[caption]

[setting] The interview continues with the correct participant being addressed.
name: Max Müller

content: I apologize, but I'm not sure I understand the context of this conversation. Could you please provide more information or clarify your questions so that I can assist you better?
name: Evaluator

content:
[caption]

[setting] The interviewer acknowledges the confusion and moves on to a more clear question.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] The interviewer asks a new question.
[/setting]

[caption]

[setting] The interviewee responds, maintaining consistency with their character throughout the interview.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] The interview proceeds with further inquiries.
name: Max Müller

content: Sure, I can answer any questions you have about my character or the interview process. How can I assist you?
name: Evaluator

content:
[caption]

[setting] The interviewer appreciates the prompt response and moves on to the next question.
[/setting]

[roleplay]
[setting] The interviewer asks a new question.
[/setting]

[caption]

[setting] The interviewee responds, maintaining consistency with their character throughout the interview.
name: Max Müller

content: As I mentioned, I'm here to assist you with any questions you have. How can I help you?
name: Evaluator
